text:
the following fails (I notived that multiple contrast fetching is untested):

```
from nilearn import datasets
dataset_files = datasets.fetch_localizer_contrasts(
   ["checkerboard", "horizontal checkerboard"], n_subjects=20)
```
title: Bug: Localizer fetcher does not support multiple contrasts
Bug: Localizer fetcher does not support multiple contrasts

text: It works now (thanks to #191). Can we close this issue?
Of course. I merge the patch but forgot to close this issue.
